title: Commercial/Residential Caulker
description:
Looking for apprentice or experienced caulker for residential new built houses. Full time job and possibility of working extra hours if needed.

High possibilities for promotion and escalating quickly within the company depending on reliability. 

If you have been with a local caulking trade for over 3 years call us to discuss salary, company vehicle etc

Must have valid working at heights and whims.

Salary depending on experience

title: Experienced / Entry Level Caulkers
description:
Are you currently in a job with no chance for advancement? Are you looking to begin a career in the construction skilled trades? ArmourCo Solutions, the premier restoration contractor in the condominium industry, is looking to expand it already successful caulking division with entry level and experienced workers. The successful applicant will possess the following qualities: - Strong work ethic - Willingness to learn new skills - Works well in a team setting - Attentive to detail - Reliable and ready to work In return ArmourCo Solutions offers competitive wages, full onsite training with on-going education (both classroom and hands-on) on all of our OHSA compliant job sites. Benefits package is available to all workers after successful completion of your probationary period and opportunities for all workers to succeed through advancement within the company. 8 hour shift Monday to Friday.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Salary: $19.00-$30.00 per hour

Additional pay:

  • Overtime pay

Benefits:

  • Dental care
  • Extended health care
  • Paid time off

Schedule:

  • 8 hour shift
  • Monday to Friday
  • Overtime

title: Balcony Repairs, Caulking, Cladding , Swing Stage
description:
Job description: SWING STAGE CAULKER

About Smid Construction

Backed by over six decades of prowess, SMID Construction Limited is a full-service multicultural certified and insured general contractor company. We offer industry-leading building restoration solutions.

Smid Construction is a family owned company that is proud to operate as one big family.

Located in Ajax, we’re staffed by a dedicated team of trained and seasoned professionals. Together, they bring over a century of hands-on experience to each and every work site. With a fervent passion for construction, our engineers can handle any level of property damage, ranging from a simple cleanup to a complete reconstruction.

Why Join Us:

· Competitive compensation package

· Full health and dental benefits provided

· Get to work directly with the business owner and CEO

· High levels of job autonomy and control

· Flexible working hours and schedule

· Great company culture - we care about and take care of our people

SKILLS REQUIRED:

· Must be fully vaccinated (2 shots) and willing to show proof.

· WAH training

· Swing Stage Users/Operators training

· Removal of existing sealant and surface preparation of various substrates including: precast concrete, structural concrete, brick masonry, EIFS/stucco, metal to metal, glass to metal

· Apply perimeter sealant application (I.e. concrete/precast/EIFS/bricks to window frame) in accordance with industry standards

· Dome/cap bead application at ‘glass to metal’ and ‘metal to metal’ window frame joinery in accordance with industry standards

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: $25.00-$35.00 per hour

This job description in no way states or implies that these are the only duties to be performed. You will be expected to follow any other job-related instructions and to perform other job-related duties as requested by your supervisor.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Salary: $25.00-$35.00 per hour

Additional pay:

  • Overtime pay

Benefits:

  • Extended health care

Schedule:

  • Monday to Friday

COVID-19 considerations:
Only fully vaccinated (2 shots) need apply

Experience:

  • Swing stage caulking: 2 years (preferred)

title: newExperienced Exterior Caulker
description:
Job Responsibilities

  • Report to site on time M-F
  • Remove materials from buildings
  • Maintain a clean work area
  • Apply new caulking to windows, doors, control joints, ect.
  • Tool all caulking to a uniform appearance
  • Apply interior caulking when needed

Required Work Experience / Skills

  • Experience working at heights
  • Able to work outside for 8 hour shifts
  • Capable of meeting at site or a general meeting point
  • Capable of working off ladders (step, 16 ft, 24 ft)
  • Capable of working off booms, scissors, AWP
  • Minimum 1 year in the caulking trade or a related field

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: $22.00-$27.00 per hour

Additional pay:

  • Bonus pay
  • Commission pay
  • Overtime pay
  • Tips

Benefits:

  • Flexible schedule

Schedule:

  • 10 hour shift
  • 8 hour shift
  • Day shift
  • Monday to Friday
  • Weekend availability

Application question(s):

  • Are you comfortable working at heights?

Experience:

  • Caulking: 1 year (preferred)

Licence/Certification:

  • Driver's license (preferred)

title: High Rise Caulker and/or Painter
company: Weathertech Restoration Services Inc. and London...
description:
The high-rise painter and/or caulker must be comfortable with heights. They may be required to work on a swing stage. Experience caulking and painting is an asset but training can be provided.

8 hours a day, Monday to Friday

Experience on a swing stage preferred. Must be comfortable with heights.

Training certificates for Working at Heights, Suspended Access, WHMIS, and Worker Awareness Training are an asset, but can be provided upon hire.

Must be able to lift 50lbs for short distances (5-gallon pails of paint).

Must have a strong attention to detail and be a tidy worker.

Exterior painting and caulking experience is an asset. Experience is an asset but NOT REQUIRED.

Job reports to the job site supervisor.

Must be willing to join a union - We are associated with Liuna 1059 in London. All employee benefits are through the union.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: From $28.21 per hour

Schedule:

  • 8 hour shift
  • Day shift
  • Monday to Friday

COVID-19 considerations:
All workers are encouraged to wear a mask while working and it is mandatory in all company buildings.

Ability to commute/relocate:

  • London, ON: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (required)

Application question(s):

  • Are you comfortable with Heights?
  • Do you like to work outside?
  • Do you have a strong attention to detail?
  • Are you willing to join a union? - We are associated with Liuna 1059 in London

Experience:

  • Caulking and/or Painting: 1 year (preferred)

Licence/Certification:

  • Working at Heights Certificate (preferred)

title: newCaulker / General Labourer
description:
Minimum of 6 months experience willing to train.

Applying Caulking / sealants to new joints around window frames, in control joints and replacing with old with new sealant. Applying insulation materials to prevent passage of heat, cold, sound or fires. Measure and cut insulating material to size.

Fast paced environment with tight deadlines, repetitive tasks which are physically demanding.

Work site environment may include outdoors, underground, at heights and confined spaces.

Your PPE equipment must include Steel-toed safety boots, hard hats, masks (Covid) protection.

Training Certificates required are Arial/Work Platform, Suspended Access, Construction Safety Training, WHMIS and Fall Arrest. (refresher training will be provided by the company to successful candidates.)

We are looking for Flexibility and Reliability

Valid drivers license is a MUST.

Qualified candidates will be contacted by email.

Covid 19 workplace protocols in effect.

Must be able to lift up to 50 lbs.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Salary: $18.00-$20.00 per hour

Additional pay:

  • Overtime pay

Benefits:

  • Casual dress
  • Company events
  • On-site parking

Schedule:

  • 8 hour shift
  • Day shift
  • Monday to Friday
  • No weekends

COVID-19 considerations:
All Visitors and Employees must wear a mask, use sanitizer provided upon entry of the building.
Daily Sanitizing protocols in place.

Experience:

  • caulking: 1 year (preferred)

Licence/Certification:

  • Class G Licence (preferred)

Application deadline: 2022-05-07

title: High Rise Caulker and/or Painter
company: Weathertech Restoration Services Inc. and London Caulking and Installations Ltd.
description:
The high-rise painter and/or caulker must be comfortable with heights. They may be required to work on a swing stage. Experience caulking and painting is an asset but training can be provided.

8 hours a day, Monday to Friday

Experience on a swing stage preferred. Must be comfortable with heights.

Training certificates for Working at Heights, Suspended Access, WHMIS, and Worker Awareness Training are an asset, but can be provided upon hire.

Must be able to lift 50lbs for short distances (5-gallon pails of paint).

Must have a strong attention to detail and be a tidy worker.

Exterior painting and caulking experience is an asset. Experience is an asset but NOT REQUIRED.

Job reports to the job site supervisor.

Must be willing to join a union - We are associated with Liuna 1059 in London. All employee benefits are through the union.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: From $28.21 per hour

Schedule:

  • 8 hour shift
  • Day shift
  • Monday to Friday

COVID-19 considerations:
All workers are encouraged to wear a mask while working and it is mandatory in all company buildings.

Ability to commute/relocate:

  • London, ON: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (required)

Application question(s):

  • Are you comfortable with Heights?
  • Do you like to work outside?
  • Do you have a strong attention to detail?
  • Are you willing to join a union? - We are associated with Liuna 1059 in London

Experience:

  • Caulking and/or Painting: 1 year (preferred)

Licence/Certification:

  • Working at Heights Certificate (preferred)

title: Caulker / General Labourer
description:
Minimum of 6 months experience willing to train.

Applying Caulking / sealants to new joints around window frames, in control joints and replacing with old with new sealant. Applying insulation materials to prevent passage of heat, cold, sound or fires. Measure and cut insulating material to size.

Fast paced environment with tight deadlines, repetitive tasks which are physically demanding.

Work site environment may include outdoors, underground, at heights and confined spaces.

Your PPE equipment must include Steel-toed safety boots, hard hats, masks (Covid) protection.

Training Certificates required are Arial/Work Platform, Suspended Access, Construction Safety Training, WHMIS and Fall Arrest. (refresher training will be provided by the company to successful candidates.)

We are looking for Flexibility and Reliability

Valid drivers license is a MUST.

Qualified candidates will be contacted by email.

Covid 19 workplace protocols in effect.

Must be able to lift up to 50 lbs.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Salary: $18.00-$20.00 per hour

Additional pay:

  • Overtime pay

Benefits:

  • Casual dress
  • Company events
  • On-site parking

Schedule:

  • 8 hour shift
  • Day shift
  • Monday to Friday
  • No weekends

COVID-19 considerations:
All Visitors and Employees must wear a mask, use sanitizer provided upon entry of the building.
Daily Sanitizing protocols in place.

Experience:

  • caulking: 1 year (preferred)

Licence/Certification:

  • Class G Licence (preferred)

Application deadline: 2022-05-07
